item.description:
Join Members of AndThatsWhyYoureSingle.com and 3 Boston Young Professionals Meetups for an afterwork get together. You should attend if you're looking to meet new people, promote your business or just kick back after a hard day of work and socialize. We'll have name tags available for our members so you'll be able to find our group.

We are excited to host another fun night were we encourage all members who are from other countries ( and the U.S. ) to come out for a night of Networking, Socializing, Connecting and More!

The evening will feature.

-Appetizers

-Light music played at conversational levels.

-25-30 fun Boston Professionals socializing in a casual atmosphere.

$5 with advance reservation/$10 at the door

Dress Business casual.

Cash bar will also be available.
 
ADMISSION:
$5 in advance
$10 at the door
*Covers supplies like nametags, etc, plus a gratuity for the bar plus the event host's time/travel expenses
PRE-PAY HERE -  http://bostoninternationalmixer.eventbrite.com/

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: International Young Professionals Happy Hour
